targets.expr: min(container_spec_cpu_quota{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container="loki", pod=~"(loki|enterprise-logs)-read.*"} / container_spec_cpu_period{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container="loki", pod=~"(loki|enterprise-logs)-read.*"})

panels.title: Number of times Tables were skipped during Compaction
